name: Seir
skill: Reduces 44%/54% DMG taken by all allies for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a daemon who speaks about everything with great sincerity. He's famous in Hell for commanding kindness. He simply tries to grant the wish of whoever summons him without any demand of compensation. Nothing about him seems particularly demonic, causing many to wonder whether he's actually an angel. However, he does in fact have powers befitting a demon—his excessive kindness leads many to depravity and corruption.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 03/05/17 to 10/05/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 03/05/17 - 10/05/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 10/05/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

skill: "If you get in my way, I won't go easy on you."
